Prerequisite Rune Oropin

You know three ancient runes that glow upon your skin when they are invoked. Once you invoke a rune it cannot be invoked again until the next day.

Rune of Destruction The first creature you hit with a weapon or unarmed strike before the end of your turn must succeed a fortitude save of become drained 1. The DC is the higher of your class DC or Spell DC.

@UUID[Compendium.aedenir-homebrew.aed-effects.Item.S6IzJbrKfdWVPj4z]{Effect: Rune of Destruction}

 

Rune of Flames Your next successful weapon or unarmed strike before the end of the turn deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on hit.

@UUID[Compendium.aedenir-homebrew.aed-effects.Item.VbeWNh48ZskernD5]{Effect: Rune of Flames}

 

Rune of Smiting Your next successful weapon or unarmed strike before the end of the turn pushes the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

@UUID[Compendium.aedenir-homebrew.aed-effects.Item.f33M6U0GztNC5Nl3]{Effect: Rune of Smithing}
